name: D365SolutionExtractor
description: This task extracts a solution and create a PR.
author: Dimaros B.V.

inputs.name: repositoryRoot
inputs.label: Repository Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sources path to be used to create a PR.

inputs.name: gitEmail
inputs.label: Git Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Email to be used for a commit.

inputs.name: gitName
inputs.label: Git Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name to be used for a commit.

inputs.name: mainBranchName
inputs.label: Main branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name to create a PR against. This branch also should be used during repository checkout.

inputs.name: branchName
inputs.label: Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name to create a PR from.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: CRM connection string
inputs.helpMarkDown: CRM connection string to be used, e.g. AuthType=Office365;Url=https://contoso.crm.dynamics.com;UserName=user;Password=password.

inputs.name: solutionFolder
inputs.label: Extract Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder name to extract solutions to.

inputs.name: unpackFolder
inputs.label: Unpack Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder with in the repository to unpack solution to.
